title: Is PGDM a better option in canada? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s not better and not worst though! You can consider doing a PGDM if you are looking for quick short duration and cost effective studies. You can easily find one of your choice with the Ontario college. Moreover, the people who has three years bachelor’s degree in India can consider doing a PGDM, since Master’s is not a option for them in Canada. The website to find a program with Ontario colleges: Types of Programs at Ontario Colleges Facilities for PGDM: Three years work placementPart-time job facility ($11 CAD minimum wage)Pollution free areaEasy to find jobs post course completionFlexible duration
